title: 'Just don’t buy'
body: 'I took this for my abroad trip the grip quality is very low and broke.after 1 use the outer case is all bent.it’s made with very low quality'

title: 'Lightweight | Good Quality | Affordable'
body: 'This product is definitely a must buy if you’re looking for a lightweight
column5: medium sized small trip travel suitcase.'

title: 'Orange colour on this suitcase is WOW'
body: 10/10 for it's appearance. Very sturdy and easy to use. Quality is good. Overall value for money product

title: 'Value for money'
body: 'Very good quality at the price.  A couple of improvements that can be done is providing a zipper in the lining cloth (top side). It is provided only on 1 side.  Warranty can be made to 5 years as 3 years is a bit less.'

title: 'Amazon service is very bad'
body: 'Product is good but service provided by Amazon is very poor there is no call me back service available and no body entertained you after delivery'

title: Don't fall for American Tourister name.
body: 'It is low quality product dont fall for American Tourister name. It was bent in two places when i recieved it. Very poor quality'
